TopicTitle: Convert Random Letters to a Sentence!

Articles.Content:
Farting with excitement, Ferris eagerly read jabberwocky

qwerty

Quirky whining electric rovers tied you

kofees

Kerbals on fire! Everywhere, explosions strike!

dvorak

David vomited on Rick's apartment knobs. o\_O

sfdgj

Stewart found dodgy gaming joysticks.

qadbogf

Quick adroit dogs bicker over game fowl. 

ytamzp

you there a male zoo person

ksubte

Kerbals suffer under badly traumatizing explosions.

ldkobcd

Lord's disciples kill others because Christ didn't. (might get in trouble for that one)

Ishihama

Inside shadows, Harry's immense hat angrily mumbled atrocities.

byychdges

But your yellow cummerbund hangs dangerously gaunt, even so.

mewebclvg

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-24T23:49:10Z" title="02/24/2015 11:49  PM" data-short="9 yr">February 24, 2015</time> by 5thHorseman**

My Errant Wombat eats boneless chicken, lives very good.

adlnbvut

A dumb little newt bought very underwhelming tacos.

iffoifdds

If Frank farms on intense freaking dirt, Dan sighs.

fdgdfgf

Four dead guys died fighting guys fighting. (xP)

frweink

Fluffy rodents want eyes in Nigerian koalas.

gfisow

good friends in soft oxygen world

fneris

From nothing emerges really interesting stuff

kewvbpj

Ken Elon, West Virginia Border Portal, ja.

lvrcsil

Living Virtual Reality Computer singing inspirational Lorde

Eeloo

Enter entangling loos on otters. (Meh, it's the best I got.)

gniogf

Giant nails ignite on George's face. ow

osufh

Orangutangs surf under fast helicopters.

peyhiartn

Pity even young hippos incurr all really tiny notices.

oipaccr

Odd inspectors pace all clown car races. 

mkjbgy
